title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Mindset Design for STEM Growth in Mathematics Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can demonstrate a growth mindset attitude, perceiving failure as an opportunity for growth during the math problem-solving process, with participation rates exceeding 80%.
Learners achieve the ability to explain complex mathematical concepts three or more times through peer feedback and collaborative activities.
By the end of the course, learners can write a self-assessment report and present three or more specific examples of how a growth mindset has impacted the sustainability of their math learning.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
